kpi.name: M8013C34

kpi_info.title: Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for delay tolerant access
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for delayTolerantAccess connections. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED is started. UPDATED: The reception of an RRCConnectionRequest message with delayTolerantAccess EstablishmentCause sent by the UE to eNB.

kpi.kpi_alias: Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for delay tolerant access
